Html:
hi!

isnt it possible to change the size of the font? im using excel writer 5 of phpExcel 1.4.5

i tried changing the value in the constructor in Font.php but the font size remained the same...

Try this:
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValue('A1', 'Text');
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle('A1')->getFont()->setSize(20);

You will find more examples in the file 05featuredemo.inc.php located in the Tests directory.
